name: vibe-da-ibm-cloud
description: Deploy a live, vibe-driven HTML landing zone powered by IBM Cloud Object Storage (Lite). Paste your code, manifest your vibe, and share it live — instantly and repeatedly.
long_description:
This Deployable Architecture provisions a free IBM Cloud Object Storage (Lite) instance, creates a globally accessible bucket, configures website hosting with a live sample app, and optionally enables IBM Cloud Functions for live code updates and reapply hooks.

Use this to experiment with vibe-coding: paste HTML into the sample IDE, deploy to a public bucket, and share your creative energy.

Includes:
- IBM Cloud Object Storage (Lite)
- COS public website configuration
- Optional IBM Cloud Functions (Node.js 18) for content push and reapply
- Interactive sample web app with gradient ‘vibe IDE’ design

inputs.name: enable_functions
inputs.description: Enable IBM Cloud Functions integration for push and reapply endpoints

inputs.name: bucket_prefix
inputs.description: Prefix for your COS bucket name

outputs.description: Public website endpoint for your live app

outputs.description: The name of the created bucket

outputs.name: push_cos_url
outputs.description: Endpoint URL for COS upload function
